Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Health and Social Care NHS Foundation Trust. Offers a service to high functioning adults (with average or above average intelligence) on the autistic spectrum, including adults with Aspergers, Atypical Aspergers, High Functioning Autism (HFA), Pervasive Developmental Disorder or otherwise not specified. Offers diagnostic assessment, post diagnostic support, psychometric testing, specialist counselling, Aspergers Syndrome support groups, consultancy service, support and training to the Trust's staff. Referral from consultant psychiatrist or consultant psychologist only.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 8.30am-4.30pm (office times); Support groups and clinics, please contact for details
